info.description:
The govinfo Link Service provides services for developers and webmasters to access content and metadata on govinfo. Current and planned services include a link service, list service, and search service. Please contact askGPO for additional information about current or planned services.

The link service is used to create embedded links to content and metadata on govinfo and is currently enabled for the collections below. The collection code is listed in parenthesis after each collection name, and the available queries are listed below each collection. More information about each query is provided on the individual collection page.
info.title: govinfo-link-service-client-js

get.summary: Query: bill number, bill type, congress, bill version OR most recent

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: billtype
parameters.description: Values are hr, s, hjres, sjres, hconres, sconres, hres, sres.

parameters.name: billnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical bill number. Sample value is 1027.

parameters.name: billversion
parameters.description: If bill version is not provided, the most recent version of a bill is returned. Values are as, ash, ath, ats, cdh, cds, cph, cps, eah, eas, eh, enr, eph, es, fah, fph, fps, hdh, hds, ih, iph, ips, is, lth, lts, nat, oph, ops, pap, pav, pch, pcs, pp, pwah, rah, ras, rch, rcs, rdh, rds, re, reah, renr, res, rfh, rfs, rft, rh, rhuc, rih, ris, rs, rth, rts, s_p, sas, sc, mostrecent.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are xml, mods, premis, details, related.

get.summary: Query: chamber, section, publish date OR most recent

parameters.name: chamber
parameters.description: This is the chamber of Congress. Values are house, senate.

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: This is the name of the calendar section. Recommend encoding special characters and spaces (%20). Common sample values include Unanimous Consent Agreements, Cover and Special Orders, Subjects on the Table, Union Calendar, Bills in Conference, Special Legislative Days.

parameters.name: publishdate
parameters.description: If date is not provided, the most recent version of the calendar is returned. Values are date formated as yyyy-mm-dd or mostrecent. Default is most recent.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: congress, document type, document number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numberical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: doctype
parameters.description: This is the congressional document type. Congressional documents can either be house documents, senate documents, or treaty documents. Values are hdoc, sdoc, tdoc.

parameters.name: docnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical document number. Congressional documents are numbered consecutively within a Congress for each document type. Sample value is 15. Note: congressional documents that have been processed through the GPO collection are currently not available through the FDsys API.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: congress, jacket number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numberical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: jacketid
parameters.description: This is the GPO jacket number. The jacket number is typically listed on the first page in the lower left corner. Jacket number is unique within a Congress. Sample value is 66-208.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: title number, part number, section number, year OR most recent

parameters.name: titlenum
parameters.description: Title number. Sample value is 3.

parameters.name: partnum
parameters.description: Part number. Sample value is 100

parameters.name: sectionnum
parameters.description: This is the section number. Sample value is 1. If section number is not provided the entire part will be returned.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This is the four digit numerical year OR mostrecent. If year is not provided the most recent version of the CFR section or part is returned. Default is most recent. Sample value is 2011.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are xml, mods, premis, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: congress, chamber, committee, house serial number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 109.

parameters.name: committee
parameters.description: This is the name of the House committee. Recommend encoding special characters and spaces (%20). Sample value is energy.

parameters.name: serialnumber
parameters.description: This is the numerical house committee serial number. House hearings are not numbered consecutively across committees within a Congress. For example, 109-138 could exist for both the Energy Committee and the Rules and Administration Committee within the 109th Congress. Sample value is 138.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: congress, chamber, senate hearing number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: hearingnumber
parameters.description: This is the numerical Senate hearing number. Senate hearings are numbered consecutively across committees within a Congress. Sample value is 122.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: congress, jacket number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 105.

parameters.name: jacketid
parameters.description: This is the GPO jacket number. The jacket number is typically listed on the first page in the lower left corner. Jacket number is unique within a Congress. Sample value is 48-707.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: document type, document number

parameters.name: doctype
parameters.description: Values are executiveorder, proclamation, determination.

parameters.name: docnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical document number. Sample value is 13514.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, related.

get.summary: Query: dcpd type OR dcpd number
get.description: Query: dcpd type OR dcpd number

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This is the four digit numerical year. The first Daily Compilation of Presidential Documents (dcpd) document was published on 1/20/2009. Sample value is 2010.

parameters.name: dcpdnumber
parameters.description: This is the five digit numerical identifier on a dcpd document. It does not include the four digit year. Document are numbered sequentially within each year. Leading zeros can be supplied but are not required. Sample value is 00123. Either dcpdnumber or dcpdtype is required. If a document contains both a dcpdnumber and a dcpdtype, we recommend providing dcpdtype instead of dcpdnumber. If both are provided, precedence is given to dcpdnumber.

parameters.name: dcpdtype
parameters.description: This is the type of dcpd document. Values are digest, nominations, checklist, actsapproved. Either dcpdnumber or dcpdtype is required. If a document contains both a dcpdnumber and a dcpdtype, we recommend providing dcpdtype instead of dcpdnumber. If both are provided, precedence is given to dcpdnumber.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, related.

get.summary: Query: congress, chamber, house print number, committee

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 109.

parameters.name: printnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical House committee print number. House prints are not numbered consecutively across committees within a Congress. For example, 109-2 could exist for both the Ways and Means Committee and the Rules and Administration Committee within the 109th Congress. Sample value is 2.

parameters.name: committee
parameters.description: This is the name of the House committee. Recommend encoding special characters and spaces (%20). Sample value is Ways and Means.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: congress, chamber, senate print number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: printnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical Senate print number. Senate prints are numbered consecutively across committees within a Congress. Sample value is 4.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: congress, jacket number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: jacketid
parameters.description: This is the GPO jacket number. The jacket number is typically listed on the first page in the lower left corner. Jacket number is unique within a Congress. Sample value is 74-558.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: congress, bill number, bill type

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 115.

parameters.name: billtype
parameters.description: Values are hr, s, hjres, sjres, hconres, sconres, hres, sres.

parameters.name: billnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical bill number. Sample value is 997.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is html. Other values are pdf, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: section, publish date OR most recent

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: This is the Congressional Record section. Values are dailydigest, senate, house, extensions.

parameters.name: publishdate
parameters.description: If date is not provided, the most recent version of the Congressional Record section is returned. Values are date formated as yyyy-mm-dd or mostrecent. Default is most recent.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are mods, premis, details, context, related. Note: mods, premis, and details are returned at the package level because they are not available for section level granules.

get.summary: Query: document type, publish date OR most recent

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: This is the type of Congressional Record document within each section. Please see tables below for values.

parameters.name: publishdate
parameters.description: If date is not provided, the most recent version of the Congressional Record document is returned. Values are date formated as yyyy-mm-dd or mostrecent. Default is most recent.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: volume, page prefix, page number

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: This is the numerical volume number. Sample value is 158.

parameters.name: pageprefix
parameters.description: This is the page prefix that corresponds to the Congressional Record section. Sections are Daily Digest, House, Senate, and Extensions of Remarks. Values are d, h, s, e.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: This is the numerical page number. Congressional record pages are numbered consecutively in a section within a volume. Note: when multiple granules are contained on a page, content and metadata for the last granule on the page will be returned. Recommend selecting PDF link-type to return content for all granules on a page. Sample value is 234.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: associated bill, congress

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: associatedbillnum
parameters.description: Congressional reports often accompany a specific bill. Note: some associated bill numbers may produce multiple results. This will occur when two different reports are issues to accompany a single bill within a single Congress. In this case, the desired report may not be returned. When enabled, the API List Service will return a reference to both reports. Sample value is h.r.2297.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: congress, report type, report number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 112.

parameters.name: doctype
parameters.description: This is the congressional report type. Congressional reports can either be house reports, senate reports, or senate executive reports. Values are hrpt, srpt, erpt.

parameters.name: reportnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical report number. Congressional reports are numbered consecutively within a Congress for each report type. Sample value is 154.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: Federal Register document number

parameters.name: frdocnum
parameters.description: Required - The is the FR doc number that is listed at the end of each Federal Register document. Sample value is 2010-32535.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: volume, page number

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: This is the numerical volume number. Sample value is 76.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: This is the numerical page number. Federal Register pages are numbered consecutively within a volume. Note: when multiple granules are contained on a page, content and metadata for the last granule on the page will be returned. Recommend selecting PDF link-type to return content for all granules on a page. Sample value is 575.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context, related.

get.summary: Query: associated bill number, congress

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 111.

parameters.name: associatedbillnum
parameters.description: Public and private laws are associated with a primary bill number. The primary bill number is listed at the beginning of the law. Sample value is S. 3397.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, related.

get.summary: Query: congress, law type, law number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 111.

parameters.name: lawtype
parameters.description: This is the law type. Laws can either be public laws or private laws. Values are public, private.

parameters.name: lawnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical law number. Laws are numbered consecutively within each law type within a Congress. Sample value is 78.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, related.

get.summary: Query: Statutes at Large citation

parameters.name: statutecitation
parameters.description: A Statutes at Large citation is listed at the top of each page of a law. Use a + (plus sign) in place of spaces in the citation. Sample value is 124+stat+2859.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, related.

get.summary: Query: congress, law type, law number

parameters.name: congress
parameters.description: This is the numerical Congress number. Sample value is 108.

parameters.name: lawtype
parameters.description: This is the law type. Laws can either be public laws or private laws. Values are public, private.

parameters.name: lawnum
parameters.description: This is the numerical law number. Laws are numbered consecutively within each law type within a Congress. Sample value is 481.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: volume, page number

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: This is the numerical volume number. Sample value is 118.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: This is the numerical page number. Statutes at Large pages are numbered consecutively within a volume. Note: when multiple granules are contained on a page, content and metadata for the last granule on the page will be returned. Recommend selecting PDF link-type to return content for all granules on a page. Sample value is 3910.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.

get.summary: Query: title number, type, section, year OR most recent

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: This is the title number. Sample value is 5.

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: This is the section number. Sample value is 104.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: This is the U.S. Code section type. Values are usc, uscappendix. Default value is usc.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: This is the four digit numerical year OR mostrecent. If year is not provided the most recent version of the U.S. Code section is returned. Default is most recent. Sample value is 2010.

parameters.name: link-type
parameters.description: This is the format of the returned document. Default is pdf. Other values are html, mods, premis, details, context.
